casebody.data:
Hayes VAN GORDER, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7081. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 13, 1933. Hayes Van Gorder, in pro. per. Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIBLEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
